channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Advocates want para-surfing to be part of Paralympics after being overlooked for Los Angeles 2028
item.description: Para-surfing— a form of surfing that allows people with physical disabilities to ride waves on a board or wave ski— has been excluded from the Los Angeles Paralympics.

item.title: Wisconsin voters to set Senate race and decide on questions limiting the governor’s power
item.description: Wisconsin’s U.S. Senate race will officially be set in Tuesday’s primary. The power of former President Donald Trump’s endorsement will also be tested in a Republican congressional primary and Democrats will decide on a candidate in a swing House district to take on a GOP incumbent.

item.title: US Rep. Ilhan Omar, a member of the progressive ‘Squad,’ faces repeat primary challenge in Minnesota
item.description: Democratic U.S. Rep. Ilhan Omar is trying to avoid the fate of two of her closest allies when Minnesota holds its primary elections.
